title: Cell and organelles
description: Review some tidbits about the cell

questions.question: function of 1
questions.answer: produces and assembles ribosomes of the cell

questions.question: function of 2
questions.answer: regulates the activities of the cell

questions.question: function of 3
questions.answer: the ribosome is the site of protein synthesis in the cell

questions.question: function of 6
questions.answer: responsible for modifying, packaging and transport proteins and lipids in the cell

questions.question: lysosomes
questions.answer: an organelle that breaks down waste in the cell

questions.question: peroxisome
questions.answer: in animals, they breakdown long chain fatty acids to medium and short chain fatty acids
